c74object.name: sonus.lline
c74object.digest: Gradually ramp from the values of a number list to another
c74object.description: Gradually ramp from the values of a number list to another

method.name: list
method.digest: Set the next values for the list and start the ramp
method.description: Set the next values for the list and start the ramp.

method.name: set
method.digest: Set the current values for the list
method.description: Set the current values for the list.

attribute.name: grain
attribute.digest: Interval between two outputs, in milliseconds
attribute.description: Interval between two outputs, in milliseconds. Default is 20 ms.
